choices: No, I want another type of fantasy world
1.content:
Every great story begins with a first step, but first things first, some rules for the world:

The story takes place in the land of diaphora
It's a magical land full of men, elves and all sorts of mystical races
many kingdoms have risen and fallen over the years, and this world is full of ancient ruins and dungeons
all sorts of magical beasts (classic and brand new) inhabit the world

Do these work, or do you want another type of land?
1.title: Every great story...

11.content: Alright, now that we have our world, who is our hero?
11.title: Yes, let's go

111.content: okay, now are you a boy or girl?
111.title: A brilliant wizard

choices: Nope! You're just a normal wizard
You may have a slight romantic interest in someone in a royal lineage
You have a secret, it's white absorbant crinkly between your legs and wet
1112.content: Alright lady wizard! About to go on a quest, but just a few more questions, first, you wouldn't happen to have any secrets would you?
1112.title: girl

choices: Jax, the son of a despotic king
Scarlet, the free spirited daughter of a strict queen
11122.content: Wizards are rare, so even a new one such as yourself has no doubt been introduced all sorts of kings and queens, but one royal caught your eye, who was it?
11122.title: You may have a slight romantic interest in some...

choices: The lair of an ancient sorceress
A ruined city, consumed by dirt
111222.content: Oh yes, princess scarlet. She's always wanted to go on adventures with you (not that you've had many yourself) but her mother, queen Marilla would never allow it. She's always coddled her only heir and daughter. But perhaps if you could prove yourself a valuable member of court to the queen, she would let you get closer with her daughter. Which is exactly what you're doing today, as today, is your first real quest. The queen has sent you to an ancient dungeon to recover an artifact of great power, but what dungeon is this?
111222.title: Scarlet, the free spirited daughter of a strict...

1112221.content:
Vyrella the cruel was said to have an ancient rod capable of bringing any mortal to submission, and the queen wants you to get it.

You enter the ancient tomb, a door that only your magic could find reveals stone cut square room. With nothing but a door on the far end and a stone table in front of you. The table eminates with magic and a stone inscription in front of it reads
'Enter my tomb if you dare
But be warned
You'll find it hard to cast
When your mind
belongs to me!

I may control you
I may just embarrass you
but only time will tell
if you'll ever find your freedom'

Do you lay your hand on the magic table?
1112221.title: The lair of an ancient sorceress

choices: Yes, and you hear a voice (game route)
11122211.content: You put your hand on the table, and immediately you feel your essence being drained. The table transforms itself, suddenly a bowl of white powder, a cloth and a stack of diapers appear in front of you. In your weakened state, you feel your bladder start to fail as a small stream escapes your body for a split second. It is clear what the tomb wants you to do. Do you put on a diaper?
11122211.title: Yes (optional game route)

111222113.content:
Suddenly a voice fills your ears, as if coming from the walls themselves. A strong, sultry voice, of a powerful woman speaks.

"Welcome to my game young one. I am willing to play with you, to see how far you can make it with such limited resources. Let me explain to you, that alter you touched took a great deal of control away from you. But my magic is strong, and for all the more you leak, all the more I'll exert my control onto you. If you fail enough, you will be mine! And be warned, your resources will not last long, you'll need to pace yourself. Good luck!"

The voice vanishes, and once again your body feels weak, this time you just barely resist from losing total control and soiling your robes entirely. You look on the table, only three diapers, and you begin to understand this game of the sorceress' a little bit more.

======================
The game:
In this dungeon, you will need to balance your need to pee, with the dangers of leaking onto the dungeon floor. Choices you make will impact this system.

Every time you leak onto the floor, it will get harder.

When your stock hits 0, you lose

Try to play through the game without backtracking the first time, then explore all the options
====================

Not wanting to wait any longer, you take off your robe to prep for the diapering. You find yourself in the dungeon wearing only
111222113.title: Yes, and you hear a voice (game route)

choices: Enter the next room in only the diaper
1112221132.content:
If ever there was a time for your other, secret to be useful, this was it. You typically scorned your reliance on diapers, but needing them today means you have two more on top of the three you started with.

You quick switch out one of your childish diapers for the first of the far thicker dungeon diapers, and enter the door on the other side of the room.

The room you find yourself in is not what you expected at all.

Hook upon hooks of dresses and robes cover the walls. And in the center, a stone tablet that reads
'It's time to dress appropriately, don't you think?'
Only now do you realise that you forgot your robes in the other room, and stand currently with nothing more than your clean diaper, and your stash of spares.

What outfit do you pick?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: dry
Stock: 5
1112221132.title: 1st room: wardrobe malfunctions (EM)

choices: Ignore the chalice and move for the door
11122211321.content:
You don't know why, but you find yourself drawn to the skimpiest dress you can find. A pink piece of lace that's little more than a bra and some garter stockings. It's the exact opposite of what you would usually wear, but you can't help but picture yourself in front of princess scarlet in it. Before you know it, you're wearing the lingerie, and your focus has been broken to the point that you had begun to use your diaper while you were distracted.

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: wet
Stock: 5

-added curse: Everything you wear will be magicly turned into a sexier version, and you are permantly slightly aroused
11122211321.title: 2nd room: The cup overfloweth (EM2)

11122211322.content:
Clearly this dungeon is about being willing to baby yourself. At least that's your mentalilty when you go to the pink frilled plastic panties on the far wall. As soon as you touch them you feel your body give way, as your diaper is flooded with an urgency you didn't have before. You look down, and see that your diaper has transformed into a pink frilly cloth backed diaper that is now sagging heavily. Before you enter the first room, you need to decide if it's time to change.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: soaked
Stock: 5

-added curse: all diapers are now pink, frilled, and less effective
11122211322.title: 2nd room: the cup overfloweth (EM3)

choices: Ignore the chalice and make for the door
111222113221.content:
You decide not to risk it, and you notice that as you change into the new diaper, it too becomes frilled and pink. After changing you move on

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: dry
Stock: 4

-added curse: all diapers are now pink, frilled, and less effective
111222113221.title: 2nd room: the cup overfloweth (EM3 I)

choices: ignore the chalice and make for the door
111222113222.content:
You decide to risk it, and stay in the bulging diaper.

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: soaked
Stock: 5

-added curse: all diapers are now pink, frilled, and less effective
111222113222.title: 2nd room: the cup overfloweth (EM3 II)

choices: Ignore the chalice and move for the door
11122211323.content:
It doesn't take a wizard to notice that every thing in that room, from the most simple frock to the sluttiest bra was cursed to high hell, though being one certainly helps. You stride confidently into the next room and feel a pleasant shock in your body as you enter the doorway. Ignoring the arousal it brings on, you know you made the right choice.

The next room brings quite a puzzle however. In it, sits only a stone table with a chalice of a liquid you can't discern filled to the brim inside of it. The door stands behind the table.

You could cast a spell to evaporate the liquid, but your incontinence always spikes when casting spells, even then, it could be worth it in the face of drinking from the liquid, which it clearly wants you to do.

What do you do?

bladder pressure: low
Diaper: dry
Stock: 5

A simple nobody soon to be thrust into action

info.brief_description: You are the hero of classic wizards and knights style fantasy, with one embarrassing twist
info.description:
Take the place of a fantasy hero (or villain!) in the fantasy land of Diaphora. But be warned! Heroes in this land often find themselves prone to embarrassing and messy situations!

Rules:
18+ content is allowed
Try not to rip off existing fantasies (If the world is an entirely original one, don't throw in Gandalf the wizard or anything like that)
Add where you want!
